author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...JOYCE HANGING ON AS A TROPICAL CYCLONE...
summary:
...JOYCE HANGING ON AS A TROPICAL CYCLONE...
 As of 5:00 PM AST Mon Sep 30
 the center of Joyce was located near 22.7, -48.9
 with movement N at 2 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.
